@aabalkhulche @malvikasrivastava  we just had our first meetup in Lucknow this weekend for 'Honest Conversations over Coffee' partly focussed on mental health 
It's a  #meetup where we can have #Honest #Conversations & people enter without labels or legacy of their background, jobs, failures or successes. With just a mutual respect for the human in front of them.
It's an idyllic vision but if this connects with you, be there!
